# Tree Types 
## selections 
```{r}
spc_common_vector <- unique(df_2015$spc_common)
spc_common_vector <- sort(spc_common_vector)

simpleCap <- function(x) {
  s <- strsplit(x, " ")[[1]]
  paste(toupper(substring(s, 1,1)), substring(s, 2),
      sep="", collapse=" ")
}


spc_common_vector <- sapply(spc_common_vector, simpleCap)
```
